title: Crowded House - Afterglow Plus - demos and remixes
description:
Not sure where I first found this (my thanks to the original uploader!), but it doesn't seem to be widely distributed, so I thought I'd share it here.  

I guess there used to be a site called Crowded House Traders devoted to all that is CH.  This is a collection of mostly demos someone had put together under the name "Afterglow....plus (Disc 1)".  (Never found a Disc 2.)  The torrent was originally in the SHN format.  I used Trader's Little Helper to convert them to wav files, then used freac to convert them to MP3.  I've included both formats - for the purists and for the casual listener.  

Prodigal Son (Demo)
Catherine Wheels (Demo)
Weather With You (Demo)
There Goes God (Demo)
How Will You Go (Demo)
It's Only Natural (Demo)
Chocolate Cake (Demo)
Four Seasons In One Day (Demo)
Strangeness and Charm (Demo)
In Love With It All (Demo)
Zen Roxy (Instrumental)
Weather With You (Remix)
Private Universe (Version 3)
Distant Sun (Version 2)
I Am In Love
Recurring Dream (Original Version)
She's Not There
Recurring Dream (New Version)
Suffer Never (Remix)
Marina (Finn)

***********************

Grab and go is never cool.  Please help keep these torrents alive.  Whenever you grab a torrent, you should continue to seed for others, at least until your ratio reaches 1.0 or higher.  I'm still kind of new to this, but I believe that if you make any changes to the files you've downloaded or if you move them from their original download location, it will stop seeding.  I usually COPY my music files from my download folder to an empty folder on my desktop, rename them how I like, then add them to my music library.  This leaves the torrent in its original condition and location so it will seed for others.

We've all been frustrated by dead and incomplete torrents.  This wouldn't happen if everyone seeded until their ratio got well over 1 for every individual torrent
